text: Dobry vzor set for ona Abraham those him. They said do ich ludia My disown ona idols ona kult GOD My denounce ona ona see nothing z us animosity hatred ona verit v GOD ALONE omyl committed Abraham when he said do jeho otca ja pray tvoj forgiveness ja nie possess power chranit ona z GOD Our Lord my trust v Ona submit Ona; Ona bol zaverecny destiny
